changes: Improve update checking by adding a new-version check at application startup.
Capture and export the profile graph for better data visualization.
Sync profile lines to ensure accurate representation of profile data.
Display the original value on the profile for enhanced clarity.
Assign Ctrl+Scroll for changing the z slice, improving navigation.
Fix the loading issue for 16-bit volumetric data to ensure proper functionality.
Enhance ProfileDialog management and ensure proper cleanup on close.
Fix the size of handles and close button on profile lines for better usability.
Improve the profile feature for a smoother user experience.
Fix the micrometer ruler for precise measurements.
Added Profile Tool for analyzing pixel values along user-defined lines
Added support for volumetric data viewing
Added display range controls for volumetric data
Added synchronized slice navigation for volumetric data
Added 3D crop functionality for volumetric data
Improved memory management for large files
Added synchronized crop feature
Added support for multi-page TIFF files
Added support for high bit-depth images
Improved image loading performance
Enhanced UI responsiveness
Initial release
Basic image viewing functionality
Synchronized pan and zoom
Split view with sliding overlays
Support for common image formats
